TopicTitle: Launch Clamps Fallow you to orbit.

Articles.Content:
This bug happens a lot with the FASA launch clamps with the latest 1.04 release, and it didn't start showing up until 1.0. It also happens with stock clamps as well but only on certain craft. My gut tells me it may have something to do with the physics significance flag or something on a part its attached to but who knows.

The work around is to quick save and then reload. The clamps disappear after you reload.

![mPbk5wq.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/mPbk5wq.jpg)

Another way around the problem, as I pointed out in the FASA thread, is to keep them on your outermost boosters (IE, as far away from the bulk of the rocket as you possibly can) and/or under your rocket, and to use as little as possible as an extra redundancy. They won't collide with your rocket in doing so.
Well, I guess the "Test Launch Clamps in Low Orbit around the Sun" contracts are possible, now.
